alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 5:07AM EST until February 20 at 2:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. Kentucky River at Heidelberg affecting Lee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 AM EST Friday the stage was 24.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:15 AM EST Friday was 24.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 28.1 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 28.1 feet on 06/01/2004. &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. The next statement will be issued by 3 PM EST.
